resources.string: Sends anonymous data weekly to GreatFire App Store Metrics (requires "Keep install history")
GreatFire App Store needs the storage permission to install this to storage. Please allow it on the next screen to proceed with installation.
Apps installed by GreatFire App Store as CSV file
GreatFire App Store is ready to swap

No apps installed.\n\nThere are apps on your device, but they are not available from GreatFire App Store. This could be because you need to update your repositories, or the repositories genuinely don\'t have your apps available.
If your friend has GreatFire App Store and NFC turned on touch your devices together.
